participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Ava loves the thrill of racing her motorbike and enjoys her job as a waitress.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i have light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and health-conscious, Liam stays fit by regularly going to the gym and enjoys spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i've short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.
